verses.verse: For the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> [there were] of the <S%H7145>Korahites,<s%> <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%>

And <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> had <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the first-born, <S%H3043>Jediael<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H3496>Jathniel<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%>
<S%H9405>Elam<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%> <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H9018>Eliehoenai<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh.<s%>

And Obed-edom had <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the first-born, <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>

<S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%> [and] <S%H6469>Peullethai<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth;<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3588>indeed<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

Also to his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> who <S%H4474>ruled<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their father, for they were <S%H1>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H1368>valor.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> [were] <S%H6273>Othni,<s%> <S%H7501>Rephael,<s%> <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and <S%H443>Elzabad,<s%> whose <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H453>Elihu<s%> and <S%H5565>Semachiah,<s%> were <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Obed-edom; they and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>relatives<s%> [were] <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with <S%H3581>strength<s%> for the <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H8346>62<s%> <S%H8147><s%> from Obed-edom.
And <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> had <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H8083>18<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men.<s%>

Also <S%H2621>Hosah,<s%> [one] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> had <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H8113>Shimri<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%> <S%H3588>(although<s%> he was not the <S%H7218>first-born<s%>, his father <S%H1>made<s%> him first),

<S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H2882>Tebaliah<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H251>relatives<s%> of <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> [were] <S%H7969>13.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

To <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1397>men,<s%> [were given] <S%H4931>duties<s%> <S%H5980>like<s%> their <S%H251>relatives<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
And they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> the <S%H9512>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> alike, according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> for <S%H8179>every<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to <S%H8018>Shelemiah.<s%> Then they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> [for] his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> a <S%H3289>counselor<s%> with <S%H7922>insight,<s%> and his <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to the <S%H6828>north.<s%>
For Obed-edom [it fell] to the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> went the <S%H624>storehouse.<s%>

For <S%H8206>Shuppim<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> [it was] to the <S%H4628>west,<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7996>Shallecheth,<s%> on the <S%H5927>ascending<s%> <S%H4546>highway.<s%> <S%H4929>Guard<s%> <S%H5980>corresponded<s%> to <S%H4929>guard.<s%>

On the <S%H4217>east<s%> there were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> and at the <S%H624>storehouse<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> by <S%H8147>two.<s%>
At the <S%H6503>Parbar<s%> on the <S%H4628>west<s%> [there were] <S%H702>four<s%> at the <S%H4546>highway<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> at the <S%H6503>Parbar.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7145>Korah<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and of the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H6944>dedicated<s%> <S%H6944>gifts.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3936>Ladan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> belonging to <S%H3936>Ladan,<s%> [namely,] the <S%H3172>Jehielites,<s%> [were] the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households], belonging to <S%H3936>Ladan<s%> the <S%H1649>Gershonite.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3172>Jehieli,<s%> <S%H2241>Zetham<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
As for the <S%H6020>Amramites,<s%> the <S%H3325>Izharites,<s%> the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> and the <S%H5817>Uzzielites,<s%>
<S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> was <S%H5057>officer<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H214>treasures.<s%>

And his <S%H251>relatives<s%> by <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> [were] <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H9198>Jeshaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3141>Joram<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2147>Zichri<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H8013>Shelomoth<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> <S%H8013>Shelomoth<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H6944>dedicated<s%> <S%H6944>gifts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households,] the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> had <S%H6942>dedicated.<s%>
They <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> part of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> won in <S%H4421>battles<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H9536>seer<s%> had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> [anything, all of this] was in the <S%H3027>care<s%> of <S%H8019>Shelomoth<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives.<s%>

As for the <S%H3325>Izharites,<s%> <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were [assigned] to <S%H2435>outside<s%> <S%H4399>duties<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H8199>judges.<s%>

As for the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> 1700 <S%H2428>capable<s%> <S%H1121>men,<s%> had charge of the <S%H6486>affairs<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4628>west<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

As for the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> <S%H3404>Jerijah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> (these <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%> were <S%H1875>investigated<s%> according to their <S%H8435>genealogies<s%> and fathers' [households,] in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of David's <S%H4438>reign,<s%> and <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H1368>outstanding<s%> <S%H2428>capability<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> among them at <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>)

and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H2428>capable<s%> <S%H1121>men,<s%> [were] 2700 in number, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households.] And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6485>made<s%> them <S%H6485>overseers<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> and the half-tribe of the <S%H4520>Manassites<s%> concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>affairs<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
